name: The Matriarch
description: The mother is the backbone of most families, and the same goes for tribal communities. The matriarch highlights the importance of the woman as a mother, a nurturer and caretaker of the village. The figures in this image are of the Suri tribe of the Omo Valley in Ethiopia. 20% of the profits will be donated to Survival International; an organization dedicated to the protection of tribal rights.
